base_description: Long, rectangular, gray desk with modern design.
part_description: The desk has a flat tabletop, two side panels, and three central drawers. The side panels support the tabletop, while the drawers are centrally located beneath the tabletop.
internal_interaction_description: The tabletop rests on the two side panels, providing stability. The central drawers are aligned vertically, offering storage space. The drawers slide in and out smoothly, facilitated by internal tracks, ensuring easy access to stored items.
external_interaction_description: The desk serves as a workspace for users, accommodating items like computers, books, and stationery. It can be placed against a wall or in an open office area, interacting with chairs and other office furniture. Its modern design complements contemporary interior decor.
